subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] to frank and dave, in particular,re: touch, circuit Q, etc
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I think we should keep it simple, use a radio form K-mart, and tune it 
manually---the rest ...non-sequitor.

Frank
